source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SEQ_00<tab>Serpent Marshal Brookstone is looking to make an example out of someone.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SEQ_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのスウェスリク大牙将は、実戦経験の豊富な冒険者を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Twin Adder recruits.

target: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_TODO_02<tab>スウェスリク大牙将と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day to you)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) /var>. Still fighting the good fight, I take it? Would that we had more soldiers like you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_000<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var>か。
君は、経験、実力ともに冒険者部隊でも指折りの存在だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_001<tab>I cannot speak for the Immortal Flames or the Maelstrom, but we of the Twin Adder are not accustomed to combat in such wide-open expanses.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_001<tab>我々は、森での戦い方は熟知しているが、
ギラバニアのような、開けた土地での実戦経験は浅い。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_002<tab>The beasts that roam these lands are quite dangerous, and to be frank, our new recruits are simply not up to the task of fending them off. For you, I imagine it would be like crushing ants underfoot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_002<tab>付近の魔物は存外に手強く、
最前線に配置されたばかりの、新兵たちの手には余るようだ。
そこで君の実力を見込んで頼みたい。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_003<tab>That is why I would ask you to give my men a brief lesson in combat by slaying the antlions at Pike Falls. I've instructed them to stay well out of sight, so you should have no trouble fighting without distraction. When you've finished, any advice you can offer them would no doubt be invaluable to their training.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_003<tab>パイクフォールズにいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2163101 /var>」を3体倒し、
彼らに、荒野での戦い方を説いてやってもらえるだろうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_004<tab>They've been instructed to watch you closely, albeit from a safe distance. I'm sure they will take to heart any advice you can offer them afterward.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_004<tab>パイクフォールズにいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2163101 /var>」を3体倒し、
新兵たちに、荒野での戦い方を説いてやってもらえるだろうか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_005<tab>I'll never be a match for the Garleans if I can't even defeat an antlion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_005<tab>はぁ……はぁ……。
あんな魔物一匹倒せないで、森を守れるものか……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_006<tab>I wasn't expecting the antlions to be so tough.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_006<tab>「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2163101 /var>」が、
あんなに強いなんて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_010<tab>It's an honor to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. To watch you fight was quite inspiring. Tell me, did you have any tactics in mind before engaging the antlions?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_010<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var>殿、ですね。
お会いできて光栄です。
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2163101 /var>との戦いのお話、ぜひお聞かせください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_CHOICE1A2_000_013<tab>Only to keep swinging until victory was assured.

TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_014<tab>Yes, of course. I noticed how you consistently aimed for what seemed to be soft spots between their shell plating. I can't promise your words will remain with me in the heat of battle, but I will do my best not to disappoint you or my superiors.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_014<tab>硬い甲殻の隙間を狙う……ですか。
戦いの最中に実践する自信はありませんが、弱音は吐けません。
すぐにでも訓練に戻り、今のお話を活かしたいと思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_015<tab>I...I see... Yes, I suppose all enemies eventually yield to your superior strength. <sigh> I have much, much more training ahead of me, don't I?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERMAN02659_000_015<tab>さ……さすがは、歴戦の冒険者の言葉……。
そこに至るまでに、相当の努力を積み重ねてきたのでしょう。
すぐにでも訓練に戻り、少しでも追いつけるように頑張ります。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_016<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 29 EB02 /var> of the Maelstrom!)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>!)) ((<var 29 EB02 /var> of the Immortal Flames!)) /var>)) /var> The rumors of your prowess do no justice to what I just witnessed. What is your secret?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_016<tab>……<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var>殿！
お噂はかねがね……じゃなくて、お話は伺っております！
本日はお日柄もよく、ご、ご教授を……いただきます！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_CHOICE1A1_000_018<tab>Keep moving and wait for an opening.
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_CHOICE1A2_000_019<tab>Battles just seem to work out in my favor.

TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_020<tab>Seeing your nimble footwork firsthand, it is hard to refute the truth in that. Truth be told I'm a rather clumsy fellow, but I will practice every day until I'm as sure-footed as the illustrious <var 29 EB02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_020<tab>さすが冒険者殿、参考になら……なるお話です。
魔物の猛攻を避けながら、絶え間なく攻撃を続けるなんて、
簡単に言ってしまうところに、感動です……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_021<tab>What? Do you mean to say you've come all this way simply because the unseen hands of fate demand you be victorious? If only I could have armor so thick as that...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_021<tab>さすが冒険者殿、参考になら……なるお話です。
意識せずに、身体が動いてしまうってことですよね。
それを、簡単に言ってしまうところに、感動です……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_022<tab>Pray excuse me, I...I need time to think on this...
target: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SOLDIERWOMAN02659_000_022<tab>そ、それでは訓練に戻りますので、失礼いたします！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_030<tab>Welcome back. The men seem transformed having met you, though I suppose you're accustomed to having that effect on people.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_030<tab>実力が違いすぎて、参考にならなかったようだな。
だが、無駄だったわけでもない。
英雄と呼ばれる冒険者と話せたことで、新兵の士気もあがった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_031<tab>Sadly I have no memorable acts of daring with which I can inspire them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_031<tab>私では、そうはいかない。
上官は憧れの対象ではないし、そうであってはならないのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_032<tab>Still, I'm heartened to know there are those like you to whom they can look up to, who will inspire them to train harder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_032<tab>時に我らは兵士たちに、死地に赴けと命じることもある。
だが、そんなときでさえも、生存してくれと念じずにはいられない。
だからこそ、兵たちには少しでも逞しくなってほしいのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_033<tab>I'll be the first to admit I was skeptical when they first began enlisting adventurers in the Grand Companies, but I'm glad my doubts were proven unfounded.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_033<tab>君たち冒険者からは、学ぶべきことも多い。
以前は、私も冒険者部隊の設立には懐疑的だったが、
今では誰よりも、その重要性を認識しているつもりだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_034<tab>Safe travels, <var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ109_02659_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_034<tab>感謝する、<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93501 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93601 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93701 /var>)) (()) /var>)) (()) /var>。
